title: Part 1500 - Mandatory Continuing Legal Education Program For Attorneys In The State Of New York
content:
Part 1500 - Mandatory Continuing Legal Education Program For Attorneys In The State Of New York

State Regulations

Subpart A - Structure of Program (ยง 1500.1 to 1500.5)

Subpart B - Mandatory Continuing Legal Education for Newly Admitted Attorneys (ยง 1500.10 to 1500.16)

Subpart C - Mandatory Continuing Legal Education for Attorneys Other Than Newly Admitted Attorneys (ยง 1500.20 to 1500.26)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
